actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to extend the life of the Indian Claims Commission.

summary.text: Terminates the existence of the Indian Claims Commission on September 30, 1978, or at such earlier time as the Commission has made its final report to Congress. Authorizes transfer of claims by the Commission to the United States Court of Claims in instances where pending claims can be handled more expeditiously by the Court. States that upon dissolution of the Commission, all pending cases shall be transferred to the Court for adjudication.

titles.title: A bill to extend the life of the Indian Claims Commission.
